languages.text: "Нет мира среди звезд, лишь вечность резни и кровопролития, да хохот жаждущих божеств. Кому, как не кровавым дикарям, нести волю Всеотца в столь жутком месте?"
"There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"
languages.original_text: "Нет мира среди звезд, лишь вечность резни и кровопролития, да хохот жаждущих божеств. Кому, как не кровавым дикарям, нести волю Всеотца в столь жутком месте?"

traits.locale_text: "There is no peace among the stars, only an eternity of slaughter and bloodshed, and the laughter of slavering gods. Who will carry the Allfather's will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no peace among the stars, only an eternity of slaughter and bloodshed, and the laughter of slavering gods. Who will carry the Allfather's will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no peace among the stars, only an eternity of slaughter and bloodshed, and the laughter of slavering gods. Who will carry the Allfather's will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “群星之中没有和平。如果不是我们这些野蛮人在浴血奋战，还有谁能在这种可怕的地方行使全父的意志？”
languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

traits.locale_text: “群星之中没有和平，只有永无止境的屠杀与流血，以及那些贪婪神明的奸笑。如果不是我们这些野蛮人在浴血奋战，还有谁能在这种可怕的地方行使全父的意志？”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «No hay paz entre las estrellas. ¿Quién mejor para ejecutar su voluntad que un puñado de salvajes ensangrentados?».
languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

traits.locale_text: «No hay paz entre las estrellas. Solo hay una eternidad de masacres y derramamiento de sangre acompañada de la risa desquiciada de dioses babeantes. ¿Quién mejor para ejecutar la voluntad del Padre de todas las cosas que un puñado de salvajes ensangrentados?».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「星々の間に平和はない。血に塗れた野蛮人でなければ、誰がこの陰惨な場所で全知の父の意志を運ぶのだ？」
languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

traits.locale_text: 「星々の間に平和はない。血に塗れた野蛮人でなければ、誰がこの陰惨な場所で全知の父の意志を運ぶのだ？」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Es gibt keinen Frieden unter den Sternen. Wer soll an diesem grausamen Ort seinen Willen verwirklichen, wenn nicht blutgetränkte Wilde?"
languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

traits.locale_text: "Zwischen den Sternen gibt es keinen Frieden, nur eine Ewigkeit aus Gemetzel und Blutvergießen und das Gelächter geifernder Götter. Wer soll an diesem grausamen Ort den Willen des Allvaters hochhalten, wenn nicht blutgetränkte Wilde?"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « La paix n'existe pas dans les étoiles. Qui pourrait incarner Sa volonté dans cet endroit sinistre si ce n'est des sauvages assoiffés de sang ? »
languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

traits.locale_text: « La paix n'existe pas dans les étoiles, il n'y a que des massacres incessants et les rires des dieux esclavagistes. Qui pourrait incarner la volonté du Père de Tous dans cet endroit sinistre si ce n'est des sauvages assoiffés de sang ? »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

languages.text: "Yıldızların arasında barış yoktur. Kanla kaplı vahşiler olmasa bu ürkütücü diyarı kim çekip çevirecek?"
languages.original_text: "There is no peace among the stars. Who will carry out his will in this grisly place if not blood-drenched savages?"

traits.locale_text: "Yıldızların arasında barış yoktur. Kanla kaplı vahşiler olmasa bu ürkütücü diyarı kim çekip çevirecek?"
